other_tests.findings: Cells of moderate size with oval-shaped nuclei, exhibiting abnormalities in their nuclear structure and small nucleoli.
CD2-, CD3+, CD5-, CD7+, CD20- PAX5-, CD79α-, CD23-, TIA-1+, CD56-, granzyme B-, CD4-, CD8-, CD30-, CD138-, ALK-, Ki-67 + 60%. Cells were positive for TCRγ rearrangement.

other_tests.procedure_name: Flow cytometry analysis of the spleen
other_tests.findings: Abnormal T cells accounting for ~22.94% of total cells with characteristics: CD7++, CD16++, CD33-, CD13-, CD38-, CD117-, CD19-, CD34-, HLA-DR dim, CD56-, CD5-, CD25-, CD3++, CD99dim, CD2 minimal expression, CD4++, CD8-, TCRαβ-, TCRγδ+, CD335-, CD28dim, CD24, CD57-, CD94+, CD337-, CD158a,h-, CD158f-, CD158e1/e2-, CD158b1/b2j+, CD158i (46.00%).

other_tests.date: After chemotherapy and later in the course of treatment
other_tests.findings: Substantially reduced number of lesions compared to prior scans.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Significant reduction in lesions observed over time.
